summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, sent on March 1, 2010. The email emphasizes the confidentiality of the communication and suggests it may contain privileged information. It also includes a warning against unauthorized use or disclosure.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating a personal communication with Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, suggesting a relationship with Epstein.

connections.description: The email indicates a personal communication between Epstein and Staley, suggesting a social or professional relationship.

keyFacts: It is marked as confidential and may contain attorney-client privileged information.
The email warns against unauthorized use or disclosure of its contents.
